channel.title: Javascript on MJT
channel.description: Recent content in Javascript on MJT

item.title: Make your application actually adaptable
item.description: Preparing draft for presentation on Frontend Reunited Hi I am manish Jung thapa, I will be sharing my experience on this topic, adopting with change: Frontend Architecture and patterns My History of javascript As a user My early experience was when Javascript used to be primitive . Image slider was the only cool thing. Password validation. There was a change in behavior, checking Username or email already exists or not was done without refreshing a page, AJAX .
